metadata.title: CVE-2020-19186 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in _nc_find_entry function intinfo/comp_hash.c:66 in ncurses 6.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via crafted command.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
